lead_paragraph: Usain Bolt of Jamaica, the 100-meter world-record holder, ran the fastest time in the 200 this year, winning in 19.67 seconds Sunday at the Tsiklitiria Athens Grand Prix. The 21-year old Bolt is now the fifth-fastest man in the 200. His time was the sixth best, with the world-record holder Michael Johnson having twice run faster.
